section.name: UNIT 2: UNDERSTANDING THE IMPORTANCE OF SCIENTIFIC LITERACY FOR ADULT LEARNERS
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 2: Understanding the Importance of Scientific Literacy for Adult Learners.

This unit explores the meaning of scientific literacy for adult learners and in adult education. 

After completing this unit, you will be able to

  • describe scientific literacy and
  • explain the relevance of science to adult learners.

Please allow approximately 25 minutes to complete this unit. However, you are free to leave the unit at any time.

Select the Unit 2 link below to begin the lessons for this unit.
